title: Beorcana Sale
content:
Beorcana is now available on [MyFonts.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414015115/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Terrestrial_Design/) I set pricing at 50% until my birthday, July 4. No gifts, please!... ;)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414015115im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BeorcBug02_6593.jpg)
author: crossgrove
